prompt:
Nurse: I appreciate you letting me know. Give me a moment to check how I can best help you. Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you. I

Patient: wanted to know if I could speak to a person. I said it was fine.

Nurse: appreciate your I apologize for the confusion earlier, Mr. Benton. I'm here to help you and gather information on behalf of your doctor. Is there anything you're looking forward to doing this week?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's okay, Mr. Benton. Sometimes it's just about taking one day at a time. Before we move on to discuss your kidney disease, do you have any symptoms or concerns you'd like to share with me?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Alright, Mr. Benton. If you have any questions or concerns at any point during our conversation, please feel free to share them. Would it be okay if we go over a few topics to check on how you're doing?

Patient: I guess.

responses.gpt4: Great, thank you for your cooperation, Mr. Benton. I see you have Type II Diabetes. Have you been checking your blood sugar daily? If yes, may I know what your last blood sugar reading at home was?
responses.our_model: Thank you, Mr. Benton. I see from your records that you have Type II Diabetes. Have you been checking your blood sugar daily?
